name: Minimalist2D
description: Hi! This is my first game, so I will be glad to criticism. The jambs and bugs I'm going to fix it:) so, the game about adventures of ball in an undisclosed location in the middle of nowhere. There he will face dangers in the form of spikes lasers and cliffs. You also need to help him get out of this terrible place, and go through 6 incredibly difficult levels! Something like that) Excuse me for my English if somewhere has written is not correct and thank you for read it. I would be glad to any Donate in my direction. All the money they will go to finalize this and the following projects
